participant_1.background:
I have a big, black truck that I love taking to the mountains on the weekends.
i don t like to eat meat.
i am looking for someone.
i play the guitar.
I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more.

participant_2.background:
My family members are all very supportive of my career as a teacher
i ca swim very fast.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
i have freckles.
i am allergic to dust.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing?
I am doing well! Thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well too! I am just playing guitar right now. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to swim! I love the feeling of the water on my skin and the freedom of being able to move around freely.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been a good swimmer, but I love to go to the beach.
I do too! I love the sound of the waves crashing and the smell of the salt in the air.
What do you do for work?
I am a teacher! I love working with children and helping them learn.
That sounds like a very rewarding job! I am looking for someone to make music with. Do you play any instruments?
I play the piano! I would love to make music with you sometime
